ygData.subject: Re: Please Help! I need dueling tips!
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/13/99 12:09:31 PM Central Daylight Time, douglas@speakeasy.org writes:  I m in a guild that encourages weekly fights in pvp areas in
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/13/99 12:09:31 PM Central Daylight Time,
douglas@... writes:

<< > I'm in a guild that encourages weekly fights in pvp areas in order to
> increase prestige and guild rank. I'm currently a level 15 cleric, and
> have been challenged by a level 14 troll shaman (yipes). Any hints,
> tips, or fighting strategies would be most helpful.

Stun and flash of light to distract; furor to do the nuking?
-- >>

Cancel Magic at least 6 times to take his buffs off :)

Also, the BF hammer hits hard, but has a delay of 50 (also +10 save vs. magic)

Keep moving and save most of your mana for heals.

Is what I would do..
